description:
A set of useful items gifted by the people of Eryn.

Sepith Mass x 200
Brave Seed x 1
Dragon Incense x 1
Zeram Powder x 1
Emergency Puppet x 1

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Gifts from Eryn
